weekSummary.ws_success: AM3PO Code Optimization: Fix Sentiment Analyzer, NER, Crime Classifier and PEP Class
weekSummary.ws_challenges: Meeting tight deadlines while also trying to meet the SLAs provided is proving to be slightly challenging
weekSummary.ws_unfinished_tasks: A simple standard to meet SLAs and provide performance report

weekSummary.ws_success: AM3PO: Optimized Pipeline Production Deployement. Keyword Mapping to predicates in DB.
Fix Article Fetch, deploy AM3PO ver3 on Dev, set up 21Q LLM
AM Code Familiriazation, Audit JSON Creation, RSS to JSON stage fix, DataSet building for Shams,

3.Refactored NER, Sentiment, Crime, and PEP modules for efficiency

goalsSummary.goal_es_description: Ensure timely and efficient delivery of customer-committed features (Deliver committed features to production as per sprint/release plans)
Ensure high-quality, maintainable, and low-defect codebase (Maintain minimum 80% code quality score across codebase e.g., via SonarQube)
Ensure code adheres to secure development standards to minimize vulnerabilities (All code must comply with secure coding guidelines and pass security scans before deployment)
Minimize bugs identified during QA and post-release through better dev practices (Reduce number of bugs detected during QA and after release by improving code and test quality)
Ensure timely completion of code reviews to maintain delivery velocity (Complete code reviews within 24 hours of PR creation)
Ensure consistent code commits to support continuous integration and visibility
Ensure consistent success of CI/CD pipeline to support stable releases (Maintain a high success rate of automated build and deployment jobs)
Manage and reduce technical debt through planned refactoring and backlog cleanup (Complete 80% of planned refactoring and tech debt items)
Ensure optimal performance of backend API endpoints for user experience (Maintain 95% of API requests within SLA, e.g., < 500ms)
Ensure sufficient unit test coverage across the codebase (Maintain at least 85% unit test coverage on all critical components)
Ensure active participation in sprint planning and Agile ceremonies (Achieve = 95% attendance and active involvement)
Monitor non-scheduled development activities including bug fixes, quick scripts, and hotfixes.
